Name: Golden Wolflord
Title: "King of the Riftwolves" Golden Wolflord
Desc: A twisted beast from another world. This creature is the ruler of the Riftwolves, and wields the power to command them to dissolve space itself.
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Golden Wolflord

26032.Name: Howling Riftcall
26032.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], attaches <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C126031]</color> to opposing active character, and summons <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C126032]</color>.

C126031.Name: Golden Corrosion
C126031.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> If the character to which this is attached is off-field, then that character will take 1 $[K5] for every $[K3] that this effect has.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color> (Can stack. Max 3 stacks.)

K5.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color>
K5.Desc: Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

C126032.Name: Rifthound Skull
C126032.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 $[K106]. Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C126031]</color> to opposing active character.

K106.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>
K106.Desc:
Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Hydro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Pyro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)

26033.Name: Golden Cankerbind
26033.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], deals 1 $[K5] to all opposing characters on standby, then attaches<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C126031]</color> to all opposing characters.

K5.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color>
K5.Desc: Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.

C126031.Name: Golden Corrosion
C126031.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> If the character to which this is attached is off-field, then that character will take 1 $[K5] for every $[K3] that this effect has.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color> (Can stack. Max 3 stacks.)

K5.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color>
K5.Desc: Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
